name: Logicatory
description:
Logicatory is a Ludum Dare 41 project that blends platformer and first person shooter. It is a one-man project, scripting & graphics were all hand-made over the 72 hours jam.

Controls: Standard first person movement (WASD + mouse) Shoot with left mouse click F for flashlight E for use or grab/drop item Shift for run/sprint

For the sake of completeness, original 

KNOWN BUGS:

  1. Character can fall under ground in 2 locations 
  2. Turrets detect you through wall
